name: The Knight of the Golden Rose
name_original: The Knight of the Golden Rose
description:
Description

In medieval England, Cecilia dreams of becoming a sorcerer and living out the stories of knights and dragons that she has only read about in books. When her childhood friend, Anselm, reveals that he is related to the king of England, the two embark on a journey across the country to discover the realm's lost magic and grow closer along the way.

Features
  • Two endings
  • An easter egg ending
  • NVL
  • High quality sprites
  • 3-5 hours of playtime
Extras

If you enjoyed the game, please consider donating! If you give $2.99 or more you can get all the art assets from my game and the source code for the RenPy project. I used a lot of custom code to make NVL mode work properly in RenPy, so I hope the code will help you with your own RenPy projects! If you downloaded the source files, please feel free to DM me @rikichiiii on Twitter for any questions!
